Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- Values to indicate weather conditions that affect speed limits.

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Speed applies when fog is present.
-- Description -- SOURCE Adapted from [Euroroads].
Definition.name: fog

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Speed applies when ice is present.
-- Description -- SOURCE Adapted from [Euroroads].
Definition.name: ice

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Speed applies when rain is present.
-- Description -- SOURCE Adapted from [Euroroads].
Definition.name: rain

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Speed applies when a certain amount of smog is present.
Definition.name: smog

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Speed applies when snow is present.
Definition.name: snow
